cat.lump.ir.sim

Interface Similarity

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Esa, SimilarityCLESA, SimilarityCLESAdocs, SimilarityESA, SimilarityESAdocs, SimilarityESAlines, SimilarityESAsent

    public interface Similarity
    Interface with the minimum required methods to code a similarity model.
    Since:
    April 13 2012
    Author:
    albarron
